author: kristwaa
msg: DERBY-2892: Closing a resultset after retrieving a large > 32665 bytes value with Network Server does not release locks.
Cleanup patch removing code that became unused after the alternative fix went in.

author: jeremias
msg: Renamed *EventProducer.Factory.create() to *EventProducer.Provider.get() to better reflect what the method does (instances may be cached and reused).

author: trustin
msg: Changed IoEventQueueHandler to accept any event source other than ThreadPoolExecutor - will solve writer-side OOM issue with this interface
